text: My Faculty Tuesday program will feature piano music of Leonard Bernstein
I've always enjoyed American classical music of the 20th century because
I feel like its music of my time and my country.
I'll be playing some serious music like the Sonata and the Touches
but even those pieces have a touch of Westside Story in them, a touch of jazz.
Also, a premiere of a piece called Bridal Suite
Which is a duet written for actress Phyllis is Newman and her husband Adolph Green
and i'll be joined by Professor Alexandra Nguyen for that piece
